summary: This is a cover email from a courtroom deputy to Judge Sarah Netburn transmitting a sealed order filed in case 19-mc-00179, which involves an application to unseal civil discovery materials related to the Epstein case in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Sarah Netburn
persons.context: The Honorable Sarah Netburn is the judge to whom the courtroom deputy is sending the sealed order regarding the application to unseal civil discovery materials.

events.title: Sealed Order Filed in 19-mc-00179
events.description: An order was filed under seal in case 19-mc-00179 regarding an application to unseal civil discovery materials.

locations.name: United States District Court Southern District of New York

keyFacts: A sealed order was filed on April 15, 2019, in case 19-mc-00179 regarding an application to unseal civil discovery materials.
The document is a cover email from a courtroom deputy to Judge Sarah Netburn transmitting the sealed order.
The case number 19-mc-00179 is related to the Epstein case in the Southern District of New York.
